description:
reddish wood with dark grains on stock; iron butt; patchbox round with floral engraving; similar, swirling floral engraving on trigger housing and trigger plate; "5263" engraved on underside; "PURDEY" engraved on either side of trigger plate; marbleized finish on barrel. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: English walnut, Damascus steel, iron, gold, platinum
title: British, Double Percussion Sporting Rifle
